query.jboss-ql: SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Bank as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.bankName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Branch as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.branchName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.categoryName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM City as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.cityName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Country as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.countryName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Currency as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.currencyName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CustomerType as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.customerTypeName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM LangText as a, Language as b WHERE a.langTextId = ?1 AND a.languageId=b.languageId ORDER BY b.languageName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Language as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.languageName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Language as a, LangText as b WHERE b.companyId = ?1 AND b.langTextId = ?2 AND a.languageId = b.languageId ORDER BY a.languageName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PersonType as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.personTypeName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Priority as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.priorityName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PayMorality as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.payMoralityName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Salutation as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.salutationLabel ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Title as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.titleName ASC
